name: Virginmedia / blueyonder / NTL gmail fix
description:
Remove the banner, adverts and whitespace at the top of the virginmedia blueyonder / NTL gmail implementation.
This allows gmail to resize correctly and scroll. 

Please note 'after' screen shot doesn't show search.
